name: selien-monorepo
description: An interface definition tool that follows the single source of truth (SSOT) principle.

scripts.test: cd packages/core && cargo insta test --review --bin selien
scripts.lint: cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien --verbose && cargo clippy -- -D warnings
scripts.debug: cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien --verbose && rust-gdb ./target/debug/selien gen
scripts.build:release:darwin:aarch64: node scripts/build/check_darwin.js && cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien --release
scripts.build:relase:linux:aarch64:gnu: cd packages/core && cross build --bin selien --release --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:relase:win:x86:gnu: cd packages/core && cross build --bin selien --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
scripts.selien: cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien && cd tests && ../target/debug/selien
scripts.gen: cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien && cd tests && ../target/debug/selien gen
scripts.gen:release: cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien --release && cd tests && ../target/release/selien gen
scripts.gen:ts: cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien && cd tests && ../target/debug/selien gen -o ts
scripts.gen:go: cd packages/core && cargo build --bin selien && cd tests && ../target/debug/selien gen -o go
